revised_title: Trypanosomes in Wild Glossina morsitans and Wild Game in the Upper Shire Valley
tldr: The authors investigate the presence of trypanosomes in wild Glossina morsitans and wild game in the Upper Shire Valley. They find that the trypanosomes found in this area are identical to those in the Proclaimed Area 100 miles north, and it is probable that cases of sleeping sickness caused by T. brucei vel rhodesiense will be discovered among the natives of this district.
